name: SuperMoose
description: You have to know Superman and his supernatural powers. Batman, who's speeding through the streets of Gotham in his Batmobile. Or Spider-Man, who jumps on blocks without any problems. So meet SuperMoose.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD5450 Storage: 1 GB available space
